mapper.insert: insert into mail_order(user_id, address_id, order_number, payment, total_price, total_num, member_cut, status, create_time, payment_time, consign_time, end_time, is_del) values (#{userId}, #{addressId}, #{orderNumber}, #{payment}, #{totalPrice}, #{totalNum}, #{memberCut}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{paymentTime}, #{consignTime}, #{endTime}, #{isDel})
